Generation IX.Scarlet: Though usually a mellow Pokémon, it will sink its sharp, poison-soaked front teeth into any that anger it, causing paralysis in the object of its ire.
Generation IX.Violet: To keep enemies away from its territory, it paints markings around its nest using a poisonous liquid that has an acrid odor.

Generation IX.Scarlet: South Province: Area One , Area Two East Province: Area One , Area Two , Tagtree Thicket West Province: Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
Generation IX.Violet: South Province: Area One , Area Two East Province: Area One , Area Two , Tagtree Thicket West Province: Area Three Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
